articles.title: Gautam Gambhir recalls his experience of sharing room with MS Dhoni: All we used to talk about was hair - India Today
articles.description: Indian players used to share rooms in the last decade, especially on overseas tours, and Gautam Gambhir was paired with MS Dhoni on their 2004 tour to Zimbabwe.
articles.content:
